pages.text: The Blade, known for its sharpness and hardness, can cut through the ground. The phrase $(o)Cutting through the ground$() means Doutanuki can cut through the katana test props placed on the ground then go straight into the ground.$(br2)Now they become zombies' rusted toys, while I still repaired one, and give it to my younger righteous brother from Inubashiri family.
A zombie with the Rust Edge.$(br)Many zombies' Rust Edge lost their sheath, or got broken, or both.
Repaired Doutanuki with its full power.
